DOC.brief_summary: Aim of this study is to evaluate the effects of the adductor canal block on the early and medium term ( 1 month) rehabilitation compared to the continuous femoral block commonly used in the knee prosthesis.
DOC.brief_title: Total Knee Prosthesis With Continuous Block of Adductor Canal and Outcome
DOC.criteria: patients undergoing total knee arthroplasty diabetes neurological disorders coagulation disorders rheumatoid arthritis chronic opioids therapy allergy to local anesthetic
